HERO.TITLE: Invitations too beautiful to be ignored.
HERO.SUBTITLE: Choose a style, send the invitation, find out who’s coming, who’s not (and who regrets it).

FEATURES.TITLE: Features that rock
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Why settle for a normal invitation when you can create a masterpiece?

FEATURE1.TITLE: Customise
FEATURE1.COPY: Customise your invitation as you like: choose colours, fonts and the perfect look for you.

FEATURE2.TITLE: Choose the emoji
FEATURE2.COPY: Pick the emoji that rocks the most, because an emoji says more than a thousand words.

FEATURE3.TITLE: Manage responses like a real boss
FEATURE3.COPY: Who’s replying? How many friends are they bringing? And how many well-bred children? Nothing is left to chance here: you decide who deserves to come to the party, who can bring company, and if the little ones are welcome.

FOOTER.COPY1: And then? Share your invitation with the world, everywhere,

ERRORS.INVITE_LIMIT_REACHED: You have reached the maximum number of invitations you can create

HEADER.USED: {count, plural, =0 {0 of {maxInvites} invitations} =1 {1 of {maxInvites} invitations} other {# of {maxInvites} invitations}}

PROFILE.TITLE: Settings
PROFILE.DELETE-COPY: Permanently delete your account and all data. This action cannot be undone.
PROFILE.DELETE-CONF: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your data and invitations will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.

INVITE.SHARE-DIALOG-COPY: Anyone with this link will see your invitation

BUILDER.GUEST-MAX: Maximum number of guests each invitee can bring
BUILDER.BABY-MAX: Maximum number of children each invitee can bring
BUILDER.NAME: Name
